title: CME Group Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
text:
© Reuters. CME Group Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3

Investing.com - CME Group (NASDAQ: ) reported third quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $1.9 on revenue of $1.28B. Analysts polled by Investing.com forecast EPS of $1.75 on revenue of $1.26B. That compared to EPS of $1.45 on revenue of $904.2M in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $1.76 on revenue of $1.27B in the previous quarter.

For the year, CME Group shares are up 6.85%, under-performing the Nasdaq which is up 27.2% year to date.

CME Group follows other major Financial sector earnings this month

On Tuesday, October 15, 2019, JPMorgan reported third quarter EPS of $2.68 on revenue of $30.06B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.45 on revenue of $28.47B.

Bank of America earnings beat analyst's expectations on Wednesday, October 16, 2019, with third quarter EPS of $0.56 on revenue of $22.8B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $0.54 on revenue of $22.58B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: CME Group Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
